about_the_game:
# Spell Fragments

"Spell Fragments" is a TPS game (Third-Person Shooter) that combines roguelike elements with a unique magic-building system, incorporating hack-and-slash style item collection.

Players become great wizards, striving to regain their former power and glory by collecting spell fragments to create their own magic, and conquering dungeons filled with countless enemies and treasures.

You can also team up with friends in online cooperative play to tackle dungeons with your meticulously crafted spells.



## Unique Magic-Building System

There are three types of spell fragments: "Triggers" that serve as activation conditions for magic, "Spells" that form the main effect of the magic, and "Options" that modify the magic's performance.

By combining these spell fragments, you can create your own original magic.

Your magic becomes increasingly powerful limited only by your imagination.

You don't need to show mercy to enemies blocking your path. As a great wizard, unleash your mastered magic to sweep them all away!



## Other Features

- Roguelike: Explore procedurally generated dungeons that offer new challenges with each playthrough. On each floor of the dungeon, you'll choose and acquire items with special effects. Maximize the synergy with your magic to create even more powerful spells.

- Hack & Slash Elements: Defeat hordes of enemies to acquire more powerful spell fragments and equipment. Some of the items you obtain can be used in subsequent playthroughs.

- Cooperative Play: Supports online multiplayer. The system allows players with different progression levels to enjoy dungeon conquests together.

- Action: Depending on how you create your magic, you can explore your own playstyle regardless of your skill level in action games or shooting games.

- World & Characters: Enjoy a dark fantasy world with charming character designs by professional Japanese illustrators and anime-style 3D models.
